Perceptor::

"Now Bullet, I want to know why did you attacked Chameleon?"
said Perceptor


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> 
> Bullet did as he was told and sat. "Thank you sir" the weak bot 
said. His
> eyes remained face forward with a blank stare. Perceptor was at the 
moment
> the bot in charge and nothing more mattered. Protocall stated that 
he treat
> any bot in his unit with a higher rank than him with respect.
